description: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, Neuvillette is a powerful Hydro catalyst user who excels at dealing massive AoE Hydro damage and benefits from HP scaling.
talents: Normal Attack: As Water Seeks Equilibrium
info: Neuvillette is a Hydro DPS who excels at AoE damage and benefits from HP scaling. Build him for HP%, CRIT, and Hydro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: As Water Seeks Equilibrium
skills.desc: Performs up to 3 consecutive Hydro attacks. Charged Attack: Gathering the power of water, Neuvillette unleashes a powerful torrent that deals continuous AoE Hydro DMG, scaling with Max HP.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 consecutive Hydro attacks.
Charged Attack
Gathers the power of water to unleash a torrent, dealing continuous AoE Hydro DMG based on Max HP.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: O Tears, I Shall Repay
skills.desc: Neuvillette summons a Raging Waterfall that deals AoE Hydro DMG and heals himself based on Max HP.
skills.details_html:
O Tears, I Shall Repay
Summons a Raging Waterfall, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and healing Neuvillette based on Max HP.

skills.name: O Tides, I Have Returned
skills.desc: Neuvillette unleashes the power of the Law, dealing massive AoE Hydro DMG and increasing his own HP for a short duration.
skills.details_html:
O Tides, I Have Returned
Unleashes the power of the Law, dealing massive AoE Hydro DMG and increasing Neuvillette's Max HP for a short duration.

passive_talents.name: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority
passive_talents.desc: When Neuvillette's HP is above 50%, his Hydro DMG Bonus is increased by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Juridical Exhortation
passive_talents.desc: After using his Burst, Neuvillette's Charged Attack DMG is increased by 30% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Gather Like the Tide
passive_talents.desc: When Neuvillette is in the party, swimming stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: Venerable Institution
constellations.desc: Neuvillette's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Juridical Dominance
constellations.desc: When Neuvillette's HP increases or decreases, his Hydro DMG Bonus is increased by 10% for 10s.

constellations.name: Supreme Authority
constellations.desc: Increases the level of O Tears, I Shall Repay by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Impartial Judgement
constellations.desc: When Neuvillette's HP is restored, his ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

constellations.name: Absolute Decree
constellations.desc: Increases the level of O Tides, I Have Returned by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Final Verdict
constellations.desc: After using his Burst, Neuvillette's Charged Attack ignores 30% of enemies' Hydro RES for 10s.
